table.sql: create table cs_attachment_folder( f_id bigint(20) not null PRIMARY KEY, parent_id bigint(20), cname varchar(250) default '', f_treeposition varchar(250) default '', creat_dtime varchar(250) default '', user_id bigint(20), APP_ID varchar(250) default '', SITE_ID varchar(250) default '' )

create table cs_attachment( att_id bigint(20) not null PRIMARY KEY, f_id bigint(20), att_ename varchar(250) default '', att_cname varchar(250) default '', att_path varchar(250) default '', alias_name varchar(250) default '', thumb_url varchar(250) default '', hd_url varchar(250) default '', fileext varchar(250) default '', filesize bigint(20), att_type int(4), att_description varchar(1000) default '', user_id bigint(20), upload_dtime varchar(250) default '', app_id varchar(250) default '', site_id varchar(250) default '' )
